actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-507.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to amend the Mineral Leasing Act to increase the maximum acreage of Federal leases for sodium that may be held by an entity in any 1 State, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Trona Market Competition Act of 1999 - Amends the Mineral Leasing Act to double the maximum acreage of Federal leases for sodium (trona) that may be held by an entity in any one State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Mineral Leasing Act to increase the maximum acreage of Federal leases for sodium that may be held by an entity in any 1 State, and for other purposes.
